page.title: 02Transport/ The Railway.
page.content: {Llandovery}has the{Heart of Wales { Railway Line}running through it, from {Swansea, Llanelli to Shrewsbury.}There are{10 passenger trains daliy}(5 in each direction) from{Mondays to {Saturdays.}There is no Sunday service. The average number of{passengers bording and alighting per day during {Winter}is{27}and in{Summer 50. There are a few{Special Passenger {Trains}which run for such events as the{Royal Welsh Show, Llandrindod {Victorian Festival}and the{Shrewsbury {Flower Show.}Other Special Trains during the year include approximately 20 engineering trains ,4 track testing trains and 10 excursion trains.
